items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. items.content_html: react-doc-render is a lightweight React library for rendering documents of various popular MIME types directly in the browser. It supports formats such as PDF, images (JPEG, PNG, GIF), text files, and Microsoft Office documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), providing a simple and unified interface to handle different content types.
items.title: nikiforov-org/react-doc-render: react-doc-render is a lightweight React library for rendering documents of various popular MIME types directly in the browser. It supports formats such as PDF, images (JPEG, PNG, GIF), text files, and Microsoft Office documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), providing a simple and unified interface to handle different content types.
